meanings.definition: To touch with the lips as a sign of love or greeting.
meanings.sent1: She will kiss her mom goodnight before bed.
meanings.sent2: The couple decided to kiss under the mistletoe.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to kiss its reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The sun kissed the horizon goodnight.
meanings.sent5: He leaned in to kiss her softly on the cheek.

meanings.definition: A touch or caress with the lips as a sign of love or greeting.
meanings.sent1: The little girl gave her grandma a sweet kiss on the cheek.
meanings.sent2: He felt her warm kiss on his forehead.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate cake was so delicious; it was like a sweet kiss on the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The first light of dawn was a gentle kiss on the sleeping city.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her kiss lingered on his lips throughout the day.
